name: Great Zombie War - The Undead Carnage Army Attack
name_original: Great Zombie War - The Undead Carnage Army Attack
description:
Zombies are out to eat your brains!

And its up to you to protect us all!

Protect your your neighborhood from invading ZOMBIES!

Join the epic battle, join THE GREAT ZOMBIE WAR!

Lead the your army of humans victory, by defining your strategy, upgrade your armour and firearms, and eliminate each zombie in the field!

Game Features:
* Outstanding NEXT-GENERATION graphics.
* IMMERSIVE CHALLENGING levels.
* TONS OF Boosts, Power-ups, and upgrades
* Control all the action in REAL-TIME!
* NO TROOP TRAINING - get straight into the fight!
* FREE Download.

So what are you waiting for? Join the epic battle!

Download The Great Zombie War now for FREE!!
